Files

conf

configuration files

webApps

Static files we created

work

Working files when tomcat is started

Deploy app by copying

Copy files in WebContent and build in eclipse to webApps file.

Use localhost:8080/personal-portfolio/index.html to access it. Note that META-INF is file only used for eclipse and can be deleted when being deployed.

Deploy by war


jar -cvf MyApp.war

cp MyApp.war /usr/local/apache-tomcat-8.0.37/webapps

When tomcat is started, this .war file will be unjar automatically. Deleting this .war file will delete unjared file as well.
